title: Luxury Five-Star City Break with Daily Dining
description:
Unlock the secrets of Abu Dhabi from one of the best positions in the city with a stay at the luxurious Bab Al Qasr, Biltmore Collection by Millennium, your gateway to the treasures of the exclusive Corniche area, close to the Presidental Palace, the Marina Mall and Heritage Village. Set on its own private beachfront and draped in iconic architecture with quintessential Arabian style and Moroccan flair, this Middle East treasure of high ceilings, gold tiles and Arabic architecture is the ultimate stopover destination en route to Europe.

Make the most of your stay with daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner, a welcome drink per person, per stay, and 25% off all spa treatments. **Bringing the family?** Upgrade to the Deluxe Room and two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free with daily breakfast and nightly dinner.
location_description: Bab Al Qasr, Biltmore Collection by Millennium
offer_address: Corniche Rd W - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Opulence with Daily Breakfast and Dinner
description: Experience the cultural capital of the United Arab Emirates in five-star opulence with a luxurious stay at Jumeirah at Etihad Towers. Rated the #1 hotel in Abu Dhabi on TripAdvisor, this lavish property boasts a private beach, on-site spa with 13 treatment rooms, seven restaurants, three bars and the Observation Deck at 300, offering panoramic views from the 74th floor, the highest vantage point in Abu Dhabi. Includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner, one beer or wine per person and unlimited access to the Observation Deck at 300. Plus, one child (aged 11 and under) stays free, with breakfast and dinner included.
location_description: Jumeirah at Etihad Towers - OLD
offer_address: Etihad Towers,West Corniche, - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: Venetian Elegance at The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal
description: Experience Middle Eastern opulence with an Italian twist at The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal, the only hotel with direct views of Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. The location is second to none: just 20 minutes from the airport, yet in the city, meaning it’s easy to get to the Grand Mosque, Ferrari World, malls and more. Situated on the Grand Canal of Abu Dhabi, the hotel boasts Venetian touches including the Venetian Village with its winding cobblestone streets and Renaissance-inspired architecture. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, one daily glass of wine, beer or soft drink per person, private arrival airport transfer and 25% off food, beverages and spa treatments. Plus, one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with full package inclusions.
location_description: The Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi, Grand Canal
offer_address: Al Maqta, Abu Dhabi 0000, United Arab Emirates

title: Top-Rated Five-Star Abu Dhabi Opulence with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Discover the epitome of opulence at the glistening Conrad Abu Dhabi Etihad Towers, a five-star city icon towering above the stunning Corniche where you'll find eight kilometres of manicured waterfront. This supremely luxurious launchpad delivers personalised Conrad service and style across a spectacular 10,000-square-foot setting.

Choose from 12 onsite bars and restaurants showcasing everything from international cuisine to handcrafted cocktails, and enjoy a lavish spa offering an extensive treatment menu guaranteed to elevate relaxation. Cool off with a plunge in the outdoor pool, soothe jetlag with a revitalising massage or soar up to the Observation Deck at 300 to take in mesmerising views of the city skyline from the 74th floor. Further afield, uncover the UAE's desert sand dunes, fragrant souks, and futuristic theme parks before returning to your lavish retreat.
location_description: Conrad Abu Dhabi Etihad Towers
offer_address: Etihad Towers, West Corniche, Al Khubeirah, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

description:
Discover the pinnacle of Abu Dhabi opulence at the glistening Jumeirah at Etihad Towers, located on the stunning Corniche waterfront opposite Emirates Palace. One of Abu Dhabi’s top hotels, this supremely luxurious five-star hotel delivers personalised Jumeirah service and style in a spectacular setting with a private beach, an award-winning spa and 10 restaurants and bars. Experience it all with daily buffet breakfast, nightly buffet dinner, a one-time poolside cocktail per adult, guaranteed early check-in or late check-out and 20% off at Talise Spa. Plus, enjoy unlimited access to Observation Deck at 300, offering the most mesmerising (and highest) views of the city skyline from the 74th floor.

Travelling with the family? One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast and nightly dinner.

Feel immediately refreshed with a dip in the sparkling pool, sweat it out at the expansive fitness centre with steam room and sauna, visit Sofitel SPA for a moment of bliss, or embark on a culinary journey at the five contemporary restaurants and two bars onsite. Further afield, don't miss a visit to Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - the largest mosque in the country - experience thrilling rides at Ferrari World Abu Dhabi or marvel at the treasures of Louvre Abu Dhabi.

Holiday like royalty with exclusive access to the Fairmont Gold Lounge and its VIP privileges, including: a private check-in and checkout at the Fairmont Gold reception area located on the 7th floor of the hotel, daily breakfast, all day tea, coffee and soft drinks, decadent daily afternoon tea, cocktail and canapés with a nightly happy hour and a daily hour of sweet treats. title: Five-Star Sofitel Stay on Abu Dhabi's Prestigious Corniche with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Position yourself in the heart of Abu Dhabi’s prestigious Corniche - a sparkling stretch of coastline with waterfront pedestrian pathways leading to a pristine stretch of beach and countless dining and entertainment options - with a luxe stay at Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche. Experience five-star, French-inspired luxury and take advantage of world-class facilities. Feel immediately refreshed with a dip in the sparkling pool, relax on the terrace, sweat it out at the expansive fitness centre with steam room and sauna, visit Sofitel SPA for a moment of bliss, or embark on a culinary journey at the contemporary restaurants and bars onsite. At the end of the day, sink into the plush comfort of your room, where French elegance seamlessly fuses with Middle Eastern sophistication.

With its glossy high rises, incredible shopping and Arabian architecture, Abu Dhabi is undoubtedly one of the UAE’s most exciting cities to visit. Spend your days strolling along the waterfront on the palm-fringed Corniche Beach, considered one of Abu Dhabi’s best thanks to its pristine sand and turquoise water. Don’t miss a visit to Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the largest mosque in the country and a fantastic example of ornate Islamic architecture. Ferrari World is the ideal spot for keeping car enthusiasts entertained, while Louvre Abu Dhabi is a treasure trove for culture vultures, and Marina Mall is on hand to satisfy shopaholics.
location_description: Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche
offer_address: Corniche Road East Capital Plaza Complex, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Abu Dhabi Desert Oasis with Private Pools, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Immerse yourself in the Arabian desert and discover a true oasis among the dunes at this unforgettable Abu Dhabi retreat. Set at the heart of the mesmerising Liwa Oasis, the largest continuous desert in the world, each villa is framed by towering sand slopes and boundless sunsets, and boasts a private plunge pool with sunbeds for the ultimate relaxation. 

With endless activities on offer, spend your days camel trekking, dune bashing, sand boarding and more before cooling off with a drink in hand at The Oasis bar. Soothe sore muscles at the Hidden Spa, find inner balance with a yoga or meditation session, and get a better appreciation of the local culture with a heritage tour.
location_description: Bab Al Nojoum Bateen Liwa
offer_address: Tal Mur’ib Road, Mzeer’ah, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Leaning Hotel Stay with Decadent Dining & Wine Tastings
description:
Forget Pisa with a gravity-defying stay in one of the world’s most intriguing buildings at the five-star Andaz Capital Gate, Abu Dhabi - a concept by Hyatt. An architectural masterpiece heralded the ‘Leaning Tower of Abu Dhabi’, this icon of the United Arab Emirates skyline promises an utterly unique escape.

Part modern art museum and a member of the world-renowned Hyatt Group, this five-star hotel is a record-breaking, art-filled oasis where you can plunge into Abu Dhabi’s highest suspended infinity pool, soaring 100 metres above the ground, and descend all the way to the 165 Below Art Gallery.
location_description: Andaz Capital Gate, Abu Dhabi - a concept by Hyatt old
offer_address: Al Khaleej Al Arabi Street Capital Gate - Capital Centre - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Grand Hyatt Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Tap into a new level of luxury and experience a stay with a difference at Grand Hyatt Abu Dhabi Hotel & Residences Emirates Pearl - a five-star accommodation perfectly set in the beautiful West Corniche area. The hotel’s facilities are nothing short of exquisite, with a stunning, sky-high fitness centre, shimmering infinity pool overlooking the Arabian Gulf and a sophisticated spa.

However, the excitement of Abu Dhabi will immediately lure you away from your stylish haven. Get your adrenaline fix at Ferrari World or Warner Bros. Plaza, where you can explore the many rides and attractions at your fingertips. Escape the heat and shop all day at Yas Mall, The Galleria Mall or Marina Mall, or admire the stunning collection of artworks at Louvre Abu Dhabi. Before you go, don’t forget to stop by the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - one of the world’s largest mosques. To round out each day, refuel at one of the sleek eateries onsite, including Verso for elegant Italian fare, Lexx for cocktails accompanied by spectacular views, and Sahha for a hearty breakfast and international cuisine.
location_description: Grand Hyatt Abu Dhabi Hotel & Residences Emirates Pearl
offer_address: West Corniche, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Award-Winning Abu Dhabi Beachfront Serenity on Saadiyat Island with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Sun, sand, beach and Arabian magic all await at this exquisite beachfront property on heavenly Saadiyat Island, just 20 minutes from downtown Abu Dhabi. Enjoy eco-friendly luxury against a backdrop of the Arabian Sea. Soak in breathtaking vistas of the clear sky and the ocean blue from the beachfront infinity pool before dipping your toes in the sand.

Delight in a culinary journey across seven unique dining venues, including fresh Italian at Mare Mare and authentic Levantine cuisine at Tean. Explore the nearby Louvre Abu Dhabi, the vibrant Saadiyat Beach Golf Club or just head to the spa's Moroccan hammam when you're looking for things to get steamy.
location_description: Jumeirah Saadiyat Island
offer_address: Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

Plus, one child aged 11 years and under stays free with daily breakfast, nightly dinner and Sinbad's Kids Club access.
location_description: Al Wathba, a Luxury Collection Desert Resort & Spa, Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Al Wathba South 56620 - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Al Wathba A Luxury Collection Desert Resort & Spa
title: Five-Star Desert Elegance near Abu Dhabi with Signature Cocktail Experience & Daily Dining
description: Deep within the desert landscape lies a once-in-a-lifetime escape at Al Wathba, a Luxury Collection Desert Resort & Spa, Abu Dhabi, the perfect space to reconnect and the freedom to lose yourself. Feel miles away from the excitement of Abu Dhabi when you arrive at this serene oasis filled with Arabian-inspired grandeur. Taste your way around multiple restaurants and bars to savour dishes inspired by the Arabian Gulf and beyond while admiring the dunes to panoramic perfection. Be sure to visit the exceptional Saray Spa, a hallmark of your stay, complete with salt rooms, snow caves and a Turkish hammam, then dive into the sprawling pool with sweeping desert views.
location_description: Al Wathba, a Luxury Collection Desert Resort & Spa, Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Al Wathba South 56620 - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: All-Inclusive Abu Dhabi Indulgence on Saadiyat Island with Free-Flow Drinks & One Child Stays Free
description:
Break away from reality with an all-inclusive retreat to the clear blue waters and fine white sands of Saadiyat Island, just a stone's throw from the bustle of Abu Dhabi. Unwind in style with a lavish Turkish Bath treatment while the kids have their fun at the onsite aqua park before hitting the beach as a family.

From Turkish fine dining to sumptuous Teppanyaki, the hotel's six onsite restaurants invite indulgence, paired with four inviting bars for refreshing sips. For the explorers, attractions such as the Louvre Abu Dhabi or the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque are ready to captivate mind, body and soul. Yas Island's thrilling theme parks are also just a short drive away.
location_description: Rixos Premium Saadiyat Island
offer_address: Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi 51249, United Arab Emirates

title: Jumeirah Luxury on the Natural Shores of Saadiyat Island
description: Combining Jumeirah’s refined signature luxury with sustainability, Jumeirah at Saadiyat Island Resort is the newest property to open on the natural island of Saadiyat - off the coast of Abu Dhabi in the Persian Gulf. You will experience the country’s best natural beach with five-star indulgence only 15 minutes from the city centre. Includes decadent nightly dinners and lavish daily breakfast at your choice of multiple Jumeirah restaurants, access to the Observation Deck at 300 at Jumeirah at Etihad Towers in central Abu Dhabi, welcome glass of wine or beer on arrival, 20% off blissful spa treatments and more. Plus, the package is valid for two adults and one child (aged 11 years and under).
location_description: Jumeirah at Saadiyat Island Resort
offer_address: Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: Pristine Serviced Abu Dhabi Apartments with Beach Access, Onsite Dining and Outdoor Pool
description: Soak up sleek city vibes and superior service at InterContinental Residences Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel, a high-rise collection of residences in the heart of the city. The building boasts two urban contemporary lounges and restaurants offering bites and drinks, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and lush outdoor pool. And with direct beach access and sun loungers looking onto the InterContinental Abu Dhabi Marina, guests' can prioritize their relaxation and well-being throughout their stay.
location_description: InterContinental Residences Abu Dhabi , an IHG hotel
offer_address: Zayed The First Street Abu Dhabi 4171 United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi
title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Emirates Palace Stay with Private Beach
description:
Unmatched Arabian opulence awaits with a stay at Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi, an oasis of modern luxury elevated by magnificent views of the shimmering Persian Gulf and a private beach. Each room is masterfully appointed, furnished beyond comfort and enhanced with a blend of modern and traditional touches. 

This urban oasis has everything you need for the ultimate escape, with two pools, an onsite spa and extraordinary dining venues ranging from traditional Spanish fare to Indian fine dining. You’ll also only be a short distance from some of Abu Dhabi’s best attractions, including the Presidential Palace, Louvre Abu Dhabi and the turquoise waters of Corniche Beach.
location_description: Emirates Palace Mandarin Oriental, Abu Dhabi
offer_address: West Corniche Rd - Al Ras Al Akhdar - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star Abu Dhabi Escape Between Mangroves & Skyscrapers
description: The Anantara Eastern Mangroves Abu Dhabi Hotel sits astride the border between Abu Dhabi’s skyscrapers and verdant expanses of tranquil mangroves. Strike out into the city for retail therapy or venture into the desert for immersive experiences like camel riding or archery. Savour sumptuous cuisine at restaurants on-site, and have a drink at the scenic Pool Deck. Indulge in a soothing treatment at the Anantara Spa before retiring to gaze over lush mangroves from the privacy of a lavish room or suite.
location_description: Anantara Eastern Mangroves Abu Dhabi Hotel
offer_address: P.O. Box 128555, Sheikh Zayed Street, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Exclusive Abu Dhabi Luxury Villas on Private Beachfront with Seven Restaurants & Hammam-Inspired Spa
description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds at these palatial villas, which offer secluded five-star comfort within the all-inclusive amenities of Rixos Premium Saadiyat Island. Discover opulent Abu Dhabi from these outstanding hideaways, located along the sands of a private beach, but within easy distance of landmarks like the grand Louvre Abu Dhabi. 

Savour the exquisite flavours of the Middle East and beyond across seven international restaurants, or enjoy a refreshing drink at Ame Beach Bar, perched on the sands of the resort's private beach. Balance the mind and body at Anjana Spa, inspired by the hammams of Turkey and Morocco, or simply spend time by the stunning infinity pool - either way, relaxation is guaranteed.
location_description: Club Privé By Rixos Saadiyat
offer_address: Rixos Premium Saadiyat Island, Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi 35665, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
title: Seaside Abu Dhabi Retreat with Private Beach
description:
Discover a playful side to Abu Dhabi at Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi, a beachfront haven in a serene pocket of this thriving metropolis. Days can be spent lounging on the resort's private beach, where pristine sands, lush green grass and sun-soaked loungers beckon. When hunger strikes, the onsite Afyä restaurant serves up a tasty assortment of Western specialties, fresh seafood and mouthwatering Asian fusion dishes. Poolside snacks and handcrafted cocktails can be savoured at Poolbar, while the Lobby Lounge, situated under a glorious glass roof, boasts a drink menu made to excite discerning palates. The fresh pops of lime and violet throughout common areas alongside statement furniture and contemporary artwork give the entire hotel a sleek, youthful feel.

Housing a well-equipped fitness centre, a dedicated play area for children and a luxurious spa, Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi has plenty to keep you occupied onsite. Still, under a 10-minute drive away, you'll find the Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, while other top sights, including the Louvre Abu Dhabi, Ferrari World and Yas Waterworld waterpark, are under a 25-minute drive away.
location_description: Traders Hotel, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Khor Al Maqta, Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star Fairmont Abu Dhabi Escape with Private Beach & Grand Mosque Views
description:
Experience the grandeur of the Middle East with a stay at this opulent urban oasis, set on Abu Dhabi Creek and overlooking the white-marble minarets of the iconic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. Spend your days lazing on the private beach, or indulge at the hotel's eight dining venues, including the renowned Marco Pierre White Steakhouse & Grill.

Explore the city's range of experiences, from the traditional souks to the modern Yas Island, home to the Formula 1 circuit and the thrilling Ferrari World. Back at the hotel, plunge into one of the two temperature-controlled swimming pools or rejuvenate at the wellness centre, offering a range of relaxing treatments.
location_description: Fairmont Bab Al Bahr - Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Khor, Al Maqta' St, Rabdan, RB2, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Lavish Abu Dhabi Five-Star Oasis with Five Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Escape to the cultural heart of the United Arab Emirates with a decadent stay at the Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel. Located in the heart of Abu Dhabi, this hotel is the ideal destination to relax on the nearby beaches, partake in some retail therapy and explore the history of the city. Soak in your surroundings, then return to this oasis for a dip in the pool to escape the heat and dine in your choice of five onsite restaurants and bars.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Sheikh Hamdan Street, Al Danah Zone 1, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Contemporary Abu Dhabi City Break with Three Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
description:
Uncover a blend of Arabian hospitality and modern elegance at this Novotel sanctuary, perfectly situated near Abu Dhabi's bustling business district and the Rabdan area. Soak up the panoramic city and mountain vistas, lounge by the sparkling pool and rejuvenate with treatments at the spa.

When hunger strikes, tuck into Italian, Mediterranean or global delicacies across the hotel's three restaurants. Later, sip on cocktails from the trendy Al Nasseem Pool Bar and spend relaxing evenings in the shisha lounge. If you wish to explore, the Sheikh Zayed Mosque, Ferrari World and Yas Island are all within easy reach.
location_description: Novotel Abu Dhabi Gate
offer_address: 222 Al Maqta Street, Rabdan, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Shangri-La Hotel, Qaryat al Beri Abu Dhabi
title: Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Abu Dhabi with a Private Beach
description:
Experience the cultural capital of the United Arab Emirates in five-star luxury with a royal stay at the iconic Shangri-La Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi. A peaceful beachfront oasis in the heart of one of the world's most exciting cities, this lavish property boasts a stunning one-kilometre-long private beach, seven restaurants and bars, and CHI, The Spa, which promises to ramp up the relaxation with signature treatments in a tranquil setting. 

The resort’s many high-end facilities are all connected by a winding waterway where traditional abra boats move you throughout the property. Other highlights include a pool where you can relax on one of the many surrounding sun loungers, a health club with a lap pool, fitness centre and yoga room. A short distance from the city centre, this beachfront retreat has spectacular views overlooking the Khor Al Maqta canal and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. Abu Dhabi presents infinite opportunities to explore the country’s rich history with diverse museums and exhibitions, impressive monuments and delectable food - all sprinkled with a good measure of Arabian glamour.
location_description: Shangri-La Qaryat Al Beri, Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Khor Al Maqta, Qaryat al Beri, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Five-Star City Glamour in the Heart of Abu Dhabi with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description:
Stay in the heart of the action at Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi, a five-star hotel in the city's gleaming business district, housed in a striking glass tower. Ascend to the rooftop, where you will be rewarded with epic panoramic views of Abu Dhabi, a rooftop pool and the poolside Dusit Breeze bar, which serves up delicious light bites, fruit smoothies, vitamin boosters and handcrafted cocktails. A visit to Naam Spa is a must, with its eight tranquil treatment rooms and exceptional remedies that will leave you floating for the rest of the day.

Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi places its guests in a prime position to explore the UAE's sparkling capital. Louvre Abu Dhabi, housing world-class art collections within its 12 galleries, is just a 15-minute drive away. Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque is only 13 minutes by car and is guaranteed to wow its visitors with its marble domes, soaring minarets and exquisite modern Islamic architecture and design. On the hotel's doorstep, discover Abu Dhabi's Mangrove National Park, home to flamingos, herons and scuttling crabs.
location_description: Dusit Thani Abu Dhabi
offer_address: 925 Sultan Bin Zayed The First Street (Al Muroor Road), Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa
title: Five-Star Anantara Abu Dhabi Safari-Inspired Villa Retreat
description: Embrace a safari-style stay in five-star luxury at Abu Dhabi's Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa Resort, a boutique oasis masterfully positioned within the peacock-filled golden grasslands just off the mainland. Awaken to the sight of a wild gazelle and fall asleep under stars, savour days spent tasting authentic African flavours at Savannah Grill & Lounge, indulge in traditional treatments at Anantara Spa or explore the extraordinary via an open-roof four-wheel drive.
location_description: Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa Resort
offer_address: Island - Sir Bani Yas - Abu Dhabi - United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi Yas Island
title: Abu Dhabi Beachfront Luxury with Award-Winning Restaurants & Bars
description: Say 'yas' to a stay at Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi - Yas Island, an IHG Hotel, a dynamic city escape on the shores of the Arabian Gulf. There's no shortage of fun to be had here, with Yas Beach just a short stroll away and the island's exciting Ferrari World, Warner Bros. World, Yas Waterworld and Yas Mall within easy reach. Spend days swimming laps in the 25-meter outdoor pool, keep the little ones entertained at the Kids' Club, and be wined and dined at the four bars and restaurants.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi - Yas Island, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, 41880, United Arab Emirates

title: Abu Dhabi Five-Star Jumeirah Resort on Saadiyat Island
description: Discover the cosmopolitan cultural heart of the United Arab Emirates in five-star luxury at the beautiful beachfront Jumeirah Saadiyat Island Abu Dhabi. Saadiyat Island is home to breathtaking beaches, with this spectacular oasis perfectly situated to offer panoramic views of the Persian Gulf, inviting you to relax into island life. Spend your days exploring the nearby cultural hub and soaking in the dramatic and opulent architecture, then return to the hotel to escape the heat with a dip in the pool and dinner in your choice of onsite restaurants.
location_description: Jumeirah at Saadiyat Island Resort
offer_address: Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Sophisticated Apartment-Style Escape in Abu Dhabi with Onsite Pool & Spa
description:
Discover a stylish blend of comfort and convenience at this Arabian gem in Abu Dhabi. With the stunning Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, the bustling Al Wahda Mall and the impressive Qasr Al Hosn fort within easy reach, this retreat offers an ideal base for exploring the city's myriad attractions. Post exploration, unwind at the outdoor pool, fitness and wellness centre, or rejuvenate in the spa.

Retreat to your stylish studio or apartment, with a fully equipped kitchen and premium amenities ensuring a relaxing retreat in the Gulf. Moments from Zayed Sports City, this urban retreat places you at the heart of the capital’s culture and energy.
location_description: Aparthotel Adagio Abu Dhabi Al Bustan
offer_address: Shk. Rashid Bin Saeed, Rabdan Street, Abu Dhabi 95208, United Arab Emirates

title: Sophisticated Abu Dhabi Retreat with Private Beach near Marina Mall & Corniche
description: Abu Dhabi combines five-star luxury with the best of tradition, and the InterContinental Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel, is a perfect representation of that. Take in the panoramic waterfront and city views, dive into the glittering Arabian Gulf at the hotel’s private beach, or take a leisurely stroll along the iconic Corniche, a short distance away. With world-class dining options at the private marina, a luxurious wellness centre and opulent shopping districts surrounding the bespoke hotel, there’s an endless supply of entertainment at your fingertips.
location_description: InterContinental Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: King Abdullah bin Abdul Aziz Al Saud Street, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Iconic Rixos Abu Dhabi Beachfront Opulence with Sparkling Pool, Luxe Spa & Seven Restaurants
description:
Towering tall against the glittering Abu Dhabi skyline, this architecturally supreme Rixos oasis is drenched in opulence and seamlessly elevates luxury beyond the ordinary. Perched along the shimmering shores of the Arabian Gulf, this striking hotel boasts a private beach, world-class water sports and even an exclusive dive centre.

Discover the fine fusion of Arabic, Turkish and subtle aquatic aesthetics reflecting the UAE capital city's ancient seafaring origins to its present-day cosmopolitan flair. Retreat to the hotel's sophisticated rooms, or pamper yourself with services at the hammam-style Naturelife Spa, while your kids stay engaged at the lively kids' club.

Spend your days under the sun, swimming in the sparkling outdoor pool, dip your toes in the powder-soft sands of the beach and cool off with cocktails from the Havana-inspired Isla Beach Bar. Later, embark on a culinary journey across the hotel's seven diverse dining venues, tucking into Italian, Argentinian and Middle Eastern fare.
location_description: Rixos Marina Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Marina Mall Ring Road, Abu Dhabi 61060, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort by Anantara
title: Abu Dhabi Desert Adventure in the Empty Quarter
description: Embark on an Arabian adventure among the scintillating sands of the Empty Quarter at the Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort by Anantara. Experience the world's largest sand desert with captivating camel encounters, try your hand at archery and adventure across desert dunes, or lounge in luxury with an ice-cold cocktail at the poolside bar. Venture into Abu Dhabi to experience this vibrant cosmopolitan city, or stay in and enjoy fine dining at the onsite restaurants.
location_description: Qasr Al Sarab Desert Resort by Anantara
offer_address: 1 Qasr Al Sarab Road, Al Mirayr, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Oaks Liwa Executive Suites Abu Dhabi
title: Luxurious Centrally-Located Apartments near Abu Dhabi Mall
description: Explore the modern and cosmopolitan wonders of Abu Dhabi when you stay at Oaks Liwa Executive Suites Abu Dhabi. These luxurious serviced apartments put five-star service at your fingertips, with every type of creature comfort. Escape the heat and enjoy a leisurely dip in the pool, or cool off with an iced coffee at The Coffee Club. When you're ready to explore, Abu Dhabi Mall is just five minutes away, while the Grand Mosque and Abu Dhabi Golf Club are both under a 25-minute drive away.
location_description: Oaks Liwa Executive Suites Abu Dhabi
offer_address: Tourist Club Area, Plot C-19, Sector E-16, Abu Dhabi, ADE 52920, United Arab Emirates

title: Downtown Abu Dhabi Seafront Opulence with Outdoor Pool, Six Eateries & Jazz Bar
description:
Savour five-star opulence only a stone's throw from the dazzling Arabian Gulf at the high-rise Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche in the city's diverse centre. Take a plunge in the heated outdoor pool, savour mouthwatering dining experiences at one of four restaurants and two cafes, and close out the day with a cocktail at the sky-high Jazz & Fizz Bar.

Beyond the hotel, spend your days strolling along the city's seafront, try your hand at bartering in the city's bustling souks, or visit the striking Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. After a day of exploration, find your zen at the Sofitel SPA before retreating to your elegant accommodation.
location_description: Sofitel Abu Dhabi Corniche
offer_address: Corniche Road East, Capital Plaza Complex, Abu Dhabi 44966, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Desert Islands Resort & Spa by Anantara
title: Abu Dhabi Five-Star Desert Oasis with Adventure Sports & World-Class Spa
description: Discover a palm-fringed oasis at the Desert Islands Resort & Spa by Anantara, a five-star escape on its own protected wildlife sanctuary just off the coast of Abu Dhabi. During your stay, encounter free-roaming animals (including the Arabian oryx), an abundance of family-friendly activities, and three onsite restaurants serving everything from fresh seafood to themed buffets. For a spot of pampering, enjoy a Thai massage, desert sand body scrub or scalp massage at the Anantara Spa.
location_description: Desert Islands Resort & Spa by Anantara
offer_address: 12452, Al Ruwais, Sir Bani Yas Island, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Stylish Abu Dhabi City Break with Rooftop Pool & Five Restaurants
description: Escape to the cultural heart of the United Arab Emirates with a comfortable stay at the centrally located Holiday Inn Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel. Discover Abu Dhabi’s beauty - the botanical mosaics and soaring pillars of the whitewashed Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - a five-minute drive from the hotel. Soak in your surroundings, then return to this oasis for a splash in the pool to escape the heat and explore the range of onsite dining venues and vibrant bars on offer.
location_description: Holiday Inn Abu Dhabi, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Dhafeer Street (31st Street) between Muroor & Airport, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

title: Centrally Located Abu Dhabi Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Stay close to the action in this centrally placed escape at Holiday Inn Abu Dhabi Downtown, a stylish stay within close proximity to major sights including the Louvre Abu Dhabi and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. While you're here, beat the heat with a dip in the rooftop swimming pool, indulge in modern Australian cuisine and top-notch coffee at Jones the Grocer, or go all out with pizza, burgers and grilled meats at the all-day dining restaurant La Piazza Restaurant.
location_description: Holiday Inn Abu Dhabi Downtown, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Sheikh Zayed the 1st Rd, Abu Dhabi, 32430 United Arab Emirates

title: Contemporary Abu Dhabi Escape with Rooftop Bar, Pool & Spa
description:
Embrace the charms of UAE's capital with a stay at this elegant Novotel sanctuary, perfectly situated in an exclusive neighbourhood, moments from the National Exhibition Centre. Take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool, sip on cocktails with a view or pamper yourself with treatments at the spa.

When hunger strikes, tuck into Mediterranean delicacies at Nea and savour baked delights from Mellow Italian Cafe and Bakery. The majestic Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Yas Island and the Marina Malls are all within easy reach - making this an ideal base for all your Abu Dhabi adventures.
location_description: Novotel Abu Dhabi Al Bustan
offer_address: Sheikh Rashid Bin Saeed Street, Abu Dhabi 95208, United Arab Emirates

title: Exclusive Saadiyat Island Escape along the Arabian Gulf with Water Sports, Turkish Hammam & Kids' Aqua Park
description:
Experience unparalleled Arabian luxury at this Accor wonder, located on the stunning white sands of Abu Dhabi's Saadiyat Island. This opulent beachfront oasis offers a wealth of indulgent amenities, including a world-class spa, multiple gourmet dining options, two pools and a range of facilities for the little ones. Unwind in style with a lavish Turkish Bath treatment while the kids have their fun at the onsite aqua park before hitting the beach as a family.

A host of experiences at the resort promises a memorable Arabian escape for all. For the explorers, the nearby Louvre Abu Dhabi or the stunning Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, both easily accessible from the resort, are ready to captivate mind, body and soul. Yas Island's thrilling and unique theme parks are also just a short drive away.
location_description: Rixos Premium Saadiyat Island
offer_address: Saadiyat Island, Abu Dhabi 51249, United Arab Emirates
